authentication_docs.description: Images or Documents that authenticate the experiment - eg. gel picture
authentication_docs.title: Authentication Documents

description.description: A short description of the experiment
description.title: Description

processed_files.description: Processed files that are derived from files in this experiment.
processed_files.title: Processed Files

follows_sop.description: Flag to indicate if the 4DN SOP for the selected type of experiment was followed - Yes or No
follows_sop.title: Follows SOP

reference_files.description: Reference files associated with this experiment (ex. file of sequencing barcodes).
reference_files.title: Reference Files

biosample_quantity_units.description: The units that go along with the biological sample quantity
biosample_quantity_units.title: Biosample Quantity Units

experiment_type.description: A controlled term specifying the type of experiment.
experiment_type.title: Experiment Type

___relationship_type.description: A controlled term specifying the relationship between experiments.
___relationship_type.title: Relationship Type

protocol_variation.description: Protocol Documents Describing the variations in the protocol from reference.
protocol_variation.title: Protocol Documents

items.description: A document associated with the specific experimental protocol.
items.title: Document

files.description: Information about the data files associated with the experiment.
files.title: Data Files

quality_metric_flags.description: Flags and associated info for flagging experiments with possible issues
quality_metric_flags.title: Quality Metric Flags

items.description: A flag for this experiment with link to associated QC info.
items.title: Flag

biosample_quantity.description: The amount of starting Biological sample going into the experiment
biosample_quantity.title: Biosample Quantity

filesets.description: Information about a set of data files associated with the experiment.
filesets.title: Sets of Data Files

items.description: Metadata on a set of files.
items.title: Fileset

___library_preparation_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD formatted date of library preparation.
___library_preparation_date.title: Library Preparation Date

___sap_treatment.description: Was the genomic DNA treated with shrimp alkaline phosphatase (SAP)
___sap_treatment.title: SAP Treatment

___me_pcr_cycles.description: Number of Methylation-specific PCR cycles performed
___me_pcr_cycles.title: Methyl-PCR cycles

___y_ligation_dna_input.description: Amount of DNA (units ng) input to the Y-adaptor ligation step
___y_ligation_dna_input.title: Y-adaptor ligation input amount

___pcr_cycles.description: Number of PCR cycles performed with the indexed primers prior to sequencing
___pcr_cycles.title: Index PCR cycles

___me_pcr_library_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD formatted date of the methy-PCR library preparation.
___me_pcr_library_date.title: Methy-PCR Library Preparation Date

___targeted_factor.description: The protein that is fused to the DAM enzyme, that for which the genomic targets of interaction are being probed.
___targeted_factor.title: Target Fusion Protein
